discountExpiration.description: This is the time within which offers must be converted into a booking. On expiry, a new shopping transaction is required.

payment.description: This is the deadline by which a committment to pay must be made. Payment time limit and ticket time limit may be the same.

priceGuarantee.description: This is the period for which an offer is guaranteed. On expiry, an offer may be re-priced. A price guarantee cannot extend beyond the dicount expiration time limit.
